titles.title: Emergency Economic Growth Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a refund of 5 percent of the income tax otherwise payable for taxable year 1999.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/27/2001--Introduced. Emergency Economic Growth Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat each individual as having made a payment against the 1999 tax in an amount equal to five percent of the amount of such individual's net income tax for such taxable year.
